MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW5 postcode area of Nantwich affecting properties in Wrenbury Heath Road, Sound Lane, Whitchurch Road and surrounding area. Restoration is taking longer than expected because of broken equipment on the overhead network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:14am on 20th October 2020.
